document.full_text: chris paul had 33 points, 14 assists and seven rebounds, and the new orleans hornets shocked the two-time defending n.b.a. champion los angeles lakers with an opening victory.
document.title: hornets 109, lakers 100: paul leads hornets past lakers in stunning opener
lines_and_colors: chris paul had 33 points, 14 assists and seven rebounds, and the new orleans hornets shocked the two-time defending n.b.a. champion los angeles lakers with an opening victory.
